channel.title: How can you add a command that shows a text?
channel.description:
How can I make it so if someone need help on server, they do ::help and a page comes with some text on it.
Thanks.

item.title: How can you add a command that shows a text?
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“news”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome “+playerName, 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendFrame126(”@dre@Welcome to SkillzPk! “, 8145);
sendFrame126(”@blu@=== Whats New ===", 8148);
sendFrame126("@blu@New@gre@Server@whi@Updates", 8150);
sendFrame126("@dre@PKbox is FunPk zone now!!", 8151);
sendFrame126("@dre@Npc moved or removed check out!", 8152);
sendFrame126("@dre@Shop position is new!", 8153);
sendFrame126("@dre@Wildy starts now at lvl 1 again!", 8154);
sendFrame126("@red@Server is more economy price of thieving are lowered!", 8155);
sendFrame126("@cya@More updates coming soon, please donate to keep the server up!", 8156);
sendFrame126("@dre@owner twinky- Owns", 8157);
sendFrame126("@dbl@@dre@~~ Enjoy ~~", 8158);
sendFrame126("@dbl@thanks : owner twinky", 8159);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

Read full topic
